thread.title: Snapchat Rolls Out Daft Punk Filter
thread.title_full: Snapchat Rolls Out Daft Punk Filter

author: Noah Yoo
title: Snapchat Rolls Out Daft Punk Filter
text:
Snapchat Rolls Out Daft Punk Filter To coincide with the opening of the robots’ pop-up shop Daft Punk Photo by Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images 
Daft Punk opened their new pop-up shop in Los Angeles over the weekend, days before taking the stage at the Grammys with the Weeknd to perform “Starboy” and “I Feel It Coming.” To celebrate the rare instance of activity from the French duo, Snapchat has rolled out a new filter that superimposes Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo’s Discovery -era helmet over the user’s face. Videos taken with the Daft Punk filter will feature the song “Doin’ It Right,” off the robots’ 2013 album Random Access Memories . Check out an example video below.
